ComicInfo.Summary:
Abe Sapien tries to settle into a desk job as the Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense's war against the frog monsters escalates. But while Roger leads the Bureau's military units from victory to victory, the Nazi head of a major U.S. corporation puts his best scientists to work harnessing the power of the frogmen, and preparing for the return of a bizarre villain from the Bureau's secret past-The Black Flame.
Number 19 in the B.P.R.D. series.
While the B.P.R.D. is dealing with the frogmen menace, the Zinco Corporation is breeding intelligent frogmen capable of speech and dialogue.
Abe is loosing his focus, searching for his past. He doesn't want to be on the field, afraid he might make a mistake.
Roger is taking very seriously his new role as team leader on the field, and appears to be a great strategist.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/bprd-the-black-flame-2/4000-107792/
